content: In closing, I want to reiterate the themes of todayâs update, including: first, our number one priority with operational progress in resolving supply chain and related manufacturing issues and progressing towards G4 shipments in the fourth quarter as planned, with steady scale-up ahead through 2023; second, our continued conviction in the G4 strong differentiation and its unique value proposition to drive commercial execution in a multibillion-dollar NGS market; and third, a focused prioritized product road maps to deliver G4 enhancements as well as future innovations, all supported with a strong balance sheet.
